bwwExcerpt: GmaNetwork.com: To say that Guingona is brilliant in the role of Rothko is an understatement, and that is really a failure at finding the right words for this portrayal. Last year, in "Next Fall" I had wondered why I wasn't seeing more of Guingona in theater. Kicking off the year with "Red" made it worth the wait.

that is really a failure at finding the right words for this portrayal
